item.title: ROS环境搭建与配置
item.description:
Craig Xu https://craig-xu.github.io/post/ros_env/ -

常见ROS环境配置记录

ROS

wget http://fishros.com/install -O fishros && . fishros

Gazebo

cd ~/.gazebo/
git clone https://github.com/osrf/gazebo_models.git models
sudo chmod 777 ~/.gazebo/models
sudo chmod 777 ~/.gazebo/models/*
- https://craig-xu.github.io/post/ros_env/ -

item.title: Hugo博客搭建教程
item.description:
Craig Xu https://craig-xu.github.io/post/blog_build/ -

一些个性化的博客主题配置

主题

Diary

字体

字体自定义 霞鹜文楷 代码高亮

[markup]
  [markup.highlight]
    codeFences = true
    guessSyntax = false
    hl_Lines = ""
    lineNoStart = 1
    lineNos = false
    lineNumbersInTable = true
    noClasses = true
    style = "monokai"
    tabWidth = 4
- https://craig-xu.github.io/post/blog_build/ -
